error.message: Parameter $manager of method Drupal\bulk_edit_terms\Form\NodeSelectTerms::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.

Parameter $temp_store_factory of method Drupal\bulk_edit_terms\Form\NodeSelectTerms::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\user\PrivateTempStoreFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\TempStore\PrivateTempStoreFactory instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Parameter $temp_store_factory of method Drupal\bulk_edit_terms\Plugin\Action\EditTermsNode::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\user\PrivateTempStoreFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\TempStore\PrivateTempStoreFactory instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to bulk_edit_terms.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
